title: Empire.io
author: Empire.io
content: Hello BitcoinTalk fam! How does 10x wagering sound?!Indulge in "Sugar Rush" and sweeten your gaming experience. Wager at least 100 USDT over the weekend and brace yourself for 40 free spins this coming Monday. A sugary delight to kick off your week!Steps to Participate:Register/Login at www.Empire.io.Head to video slots.Engage in "Sugar Rush", ensuring your wagers sum up to 100 USDT during the promotional phase.Await your 40 Free Spins, to be credited by Monday 18:00 GMT.T&Cs:Duration: From 30/09 0:00 to 01/10 23:59 GMT.Game Limit: Only bets on "Sugar Rush" are valid for this promo.Crediting: Free spins will be added to accounts by the subsequent Monday, 18:00 GMT.Wagering Requirement: Gains from Free Spins need to be wagered 10x within 14 days.General Rules: Standard Empire.io terms and conditions apply.For more info about Empire.io, visit: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464593.0This is a fleeting opportunity – grab it while it's sweet! Eager to see all of you spinning the reels.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Nice but do you have a welcome bonus for new accounts and if there is a welcome bius will the bonus  wagering be inclusive in the $100 total wager requirement to meet up for the 40 free spin in the following week? Because some us may likely want to try this out but then we will need some clear terms so as to avoid future conflicts,  but all the same welcome and let see how the weekend turns out be.

comments.author: Empire.io
comments.created_time: September 28, 2023, 08:06:17 PMLast edit: September 28, 2023, 08:20:06 PM by Empire.io
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on September 28, 2023, 07:53:18 PMNice but do you have a welcome bonus for new accounts and if there is a welcome bius will the bonus  wagering be inclusive in the $100 total wager requirement to meet up for the 40 free spin in the following week? Because some us may likely want to try this out but then we will need some clear terms so as to avoid future conflicts,  but all the same welcome and let see how the weekend turns out be. Hi there! Happy to see that you're interested in the promotion. The wagering for the promotion is also counted toward the welcome offer wagering, so there won't be any conflict. any wagering on Sugar Rush is also counted toward the welcome offer wagering. Our standard welcome offer is 100% up to 1 BTC, with 50x wagering (25xdep+25xbonus) but if you sign up via an affiliate you get 100 free spins on Book of Dead additionally, and lower wagering (40x). That bonus is activated with a bonus code.  Full terms for standard welcome offer here: https://empire.io/promotions/100--welcome-offer-new. Thanks for the welcome, and see you on the reels!

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Empire.io on September 28, 2023, 07:48:36 PMT&Cs:Duration: From 30/09 0:00 to 01/10 23:59 GMT.Game Limit: Only bets on "Sugar Rush" are valid for this promo.Crediting: Free spins will be added to accounts by the subsequent Monday, 18:00 GMTIs that just the last day for those who want to register? Only two days? This looks like a rush indeed   So don't you think you can extend it for interested people to register.Quote from: Empire.io on September 28, 2023, 07:48:36 PMWagering Requirement: Gains from Free Spins need to be wagered 10x within 14 days.I hope it can be withdrawn?Any condition or requirements before withdrawal?

comments.author: Empire.io
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on September 28, 2023, 08:09:44 PMQuote from: Empire.io on September 28, 2023, 07:48:36 PMT&Cs:Duration: From 30/09 0:00 to 01/10 23:59 GMT.Game Limit: Only bets on "Sugar Rush" are valid for this promo.Crediting: Free spins will be added to accounts by the subsequent Monday, 18:00 GMTIs that just the last day for those who want to register? Only two days? This looks like a rush indeed   So don't you think you can extend it for interested people to register.Quote from: Empire.io on September 28, 2023, 07:48:36 PMWagering Requirement: Gains from Free Spins need to be wagered 10x within 14 days.I hope it can be withdrawn?Any condition or requirements before withdrawal?Hi there. There are no requirements for this promotion other than wagering at least 100 USDT on Sugar Rush from 30/09 0:00 to 01/10 23:59 GMT. Anyone can partake!  There are no requirements for withdrawal, apart from wagering the free spins winnings 10x within 14 days.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on September 28, 2023, 08:09:44 PMQuote from: Empire.io on September 28, 2023, 07:48:36 PMWagering Requirement: Gains from Free Spins need to be wagered 10x within 14 days.I hope it can be withdrawn?Any condition or requirements before withdrawal?I was wanting to ask the same question: the gains from the free spin need to be wager 10 times; that's the only statement made available, but I can't fine any other thing in relation to that. And for the wagering, if I win 100$ from the free spin, do I need to wager all of that 100$ first, and the winnings will be what I qualify to withdraw, or can I just split the 100$ into 10 different segments so I can meet the wager requirements, which among the above best explained the requirements? And what will happen to the winnings that I might win from the Sugar Rush game? Will this 10-times wager requirement also be applicable to it? I'm asking out of curiosity since this part of the game is what brought the bonus, and I hope the terms also don't affect it.

comments.author: Empire.io
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on September 28, 2023, 08:20:30 PMQuote from: Gozie51 on September 28, 2023, 08:09:44 PMQuote from: Empire.io on September 28, 2023, 07:48:36 PMWagering Requirement: Gains from Free Spins need to be wagered 10x within 14 days.I hope it can be withdrawn?Any condition or requirements before withdrawal?I was wanting to ask the same question: the gains from the free spin need to be wager 10 times; that's the only statement made available, but I can't fine any other thing in relation to that. And for the wagering, if I win 100$ from the free spin, do I need to wager all of that 100$ first, and the winnings will be what I qualify to withdraw, or can I just split the 100$ into 10 different segments so I can meet the wager requirements, which among the above best explained the requirements? And what will happen to the winnings that I might win from the Sugar Rush game? Will this 10-times wager requirement also be applicable to it? I'm asking out of curiosity since this part of the game is what brought the bonus, and I hope the terms also don't affect it.Hi there!It's great that you're interested in our promotion, but I think you are looking at it a bit too complicated.This promotion requires you to wager 100 USDT on Sugar Rush between Saturday and Sunday; then you get 40 free spins in Sugar Rush on Monday with 10x wagering on the free spins winnings. After you have wagered that, you can make a withdrawal of your free spins winnings.Hope that helps to clarify things, and I am happy to alter the written terms if you tell me which part is confusing.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on September 28, 2023, 08:20:30 PMI was wanting to ask the same question: the gains from the free spin need to be wager 10 times; that's the only statement made available, but I can't fine any other thing in relation to that. And for the wagering, if I win 100$ from the free spin, do I need to wager all of that 100$ first, and the winnings will be what I qualify to withdraw, or can I just split the 100$ into 10 different segments so I can meet the wager requirements, which among the above best explained the requirements? And what will happen to the winnings that I might win from the Sugar Rush game? Will this 10-times wager requirement also be applicable to it? I'm asking out of curiosity since this part of the game is what brought the bonus, and I hope the terms also don't affect it.I don't understand why you are asking if the 10-times wager requirement "also" applies to the winning from the Sugar Rush game. You want to know if they apply to the winnings from the regular game and not only the free spins one? Obviously not, the winnings coming from your bets during the promotion are regular, because if you don't reach the $100 wagering requirement you won't get anything on Monday.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Empire.io on September 28, 2023, 08:06:17 PMQuote from: Wiwo on September 28, 2023, 07:53:18 PMEdited out Full terms for standard welcome offer here: . Thanks for the welcome, and see you on the reels!Ok nice to read this prompt response from you mate and I am also glad that the bonus wagering inconclusive in the $100 total wagering to qualify for the free spin and that is a great relief and will be some motivation to try claim the welcome bonus in not most time I avoid any form of bonuses due to the requirements. Wishing you guys the best ride here and looking forward to more active services and presence here in the forum by way of promotion of your casino since it still a relatively new one also.
